title: Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream by Ibn Sirinana What I mean is seeing the dreamer throwing the green carpet in the garbage indicates that he is committing many immoral acts and sins and that he will be exposed and exposed. This vision in a dream is generally a good vision that indicates proper nutrition and the achievement of goals and desires, and God knows best. As Seeing a green carpet in a married woman’s dream indicates her loyalty to her husband and the arrival of kindness and joining him in a new job. Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news for her regarding her kindness, food, and inheritance from family members, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing a green carpet in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates blessings, success, and brilliant success in academic and practical life, and God knows best. Also, seeing a green carpet is considered a separate dream as good news that her goals and desires for which she was praying to God will be achieved. Seeing a green carpet in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that The date of her engagement and marriage to a righteous and religious man is approaching, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a green carpet for a married woman is good news for her and future prosperity for her and her husband in their next life, God willing. As for seeing a green carpet in a married woman’s dream, it indicates... Purity, honesty and concealment for that woman and the fulfillment of her ambitions and desires. Also, seeing a green carpet in a married woman’s dream indicates nourishment, goodness and benefit in her married life and the end of the disputes that occur. Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a green carpet in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she will give birth to offspring. It is good and will support her life and also shows the ease of her birth. Also, seeing a green carpet for a pregnant woman in general is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate kindness, nourishment, and psychological comfort, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a green carpet in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a green carpet in a divorced woman’s dream indicates comfort, tranquility, happiness, religiosity, and morals that A woman enjoys it in her life. For a divorced woman, seeing a carpet in a dream may indicate that the woman will be provided with a marriage that compensates her for the continuity, difficulties, and new opportunity she lost, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about flying on a carpetInterpretation of a dream about flying on a carpet may indicate to the dreamer an engagement and close marriage with a fair and loyal girl, And God knows best. Seeing himself flying on a green carpet in a man’s dream indicates that he must cover himself and approach God Almighty and return to Him. Also, seeing himself flying on a carpet in a dream is good news of victory over his enemies and a great benefit that he will see, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want Explain it, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Money in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about money for a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a single woman

preview.html: Money in a dream indicates success and the fulfillment of desires, and money in a dream can express a person’s struggle with himself, who is responsible for desires, whims, and desires. It was said in a proverb: Whoever sees money in his dreams is necessarily a person seeking to reach a hope, goal, or goal. Whoever sees In his dream that he lacks money or needs it and does not find it, then in his waking life he is asking for more security and stability on the emotional, practical, and even social levels. If a person sees in a dream that rain is falling on him from every direction and direction, then he must beware of his whims and whims, because Such dreams express risky luck. Bankruptcy in a dream does not necessarily mean want or poverty, but rather it is an expression of spiritual or emotional bankruptcy, because money is a symbol of security, so whoever sees it in his dream can expect future days full of goodness, people and blessings. Money Or fake money is an expression in a dream of false feelings or false reality itself. If a person dreams that his money is counterfeit, then he should feel danger around him, because the dream may express a wrong situation that the dreamer believes is real. So he builds a sign of illusions on it, then wakes up to find himself bound to despair or expects failure. Imaginary money in a dream describes the falsity of feelings and perhaps the falsity of our personality, which we valued more than we should, so we were overcome by pride and arrogance until we thought that there is no one on the face of this earth worthy of respect and care except us. . The dream calls us to be patient, proactive and appreciate things as they are worth, because days may hide what we hate to happen. Counterfeit money or money may indicate the lies of others around us. The vision may warn of fraud or forgery, and it may be a warning of a false matter such as friendship, marriage, or work. Counterfeit money often expresses false promises. Interpretation of a dream about money for a single girl. Single people dream of money because it is a vehicle for their hopes and dreams, and single people dream of money because it meets their desires and aspirations for the future. Money in an unmarried woman’s dream can show itself, and if she sees it in abundance or in excess, this indicates In this context, her urgent need for it. A girl or girl’s dream of money is interpreted according to certain data, the most important of which are numbers, which means that the amount she saw in the dream can explain her dream. The best numbers or amounts that are even because they express good and happy events, such as 200 or 20,000. The interpretation does not like to see money of strange numbers. The dinar in a person’s dream indicates religion, and one dinar means a boy, young man, or a good man. The dirham in a person’s dream indicates “removing worries,” meaning removing them with the verbal expression of the word. As for the riyal, it means an honorable man, because In its pronunciation, it is close to the word “man” in some Arabic dialects, especially Gulf dialects. Interpretation of a dream about money or money for a married woman: Money in a married woman’s dream indicates children or dependents, silver money indicates girls and golden money indicates boys. A married woman who sees in her dream that she receive from

title: What is the interpretation of buying new shoes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Buying new shoes in a dream is a benign scene that does not occur often, but it includes several indicators that vary depending on the condition and color of the shoes. In this article, we will learn about the most important interpretations of seeing shoes in a dream. Buying new shoes in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is buying new shoes from a shoe store, but finds them broken, indicates the dreamer’s marriage, but his joy will not be complete, and the marriage will be miserable. When the dreamer buys Shoes of a smaller color, this indicates suffering and illness, whether for the dreamer or for his wife. If the dreamer sees that he is buying a series of unused shoes, this symbolizes the dreamer’s attempt to improve his social and economic situation. A dream about buying new shoes interprets the positive changes that will occur as a result of the transition to life. In which you will find everything you want and it also indicates happy news and a bright future that awaits the dreamer. Ibn Shaheen sees the interpretation of buying new shoes in a dream as a sign of joy and the dreamer’s attempt to overcome all the difficulties he faces in his life and work to solve them. Buying new shoes in a dream by Ibn Siriniri Ibn Sirin, in the interpretation of a dream, buying shoes is a sign of rising and reaching a great position that the dreamer aspired to reach, such as a promotion at work. The vision of buying new shoes is considered a good vision that always heralds goodness and good living, unlike selling shoes, so it is one of the harmless visions that portends evil. If the shoes are black, this indicates travel, a halal living, and earning large sums of money. If the color of the shoes is green, this indicates the religious duties in which the dreamer travels to visit religious shrines and learn about them. While if they are red, it shows a trip to luxury, pleasure, and improving the condition. Psychological. Buying new shoes in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is buying new shoes, symbolizes the happiness and pleasure that she will get when she marries a good man who knows God and treats her well. Seeing new shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the end of difficulties and the arrival of Ease and the disappearance of the worries that plagued her life. If the shoe is of an unacceptable shape and dirty, this indicates fraud and fraud by a greedy person. As for seeing the entire shoe store in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates the appropriate time for marriage and that her current age is The best age for marriage and may God bless her with a good man. Buying tight shoes in a dream for a girl indicates haste and an inability to think about the right decisions and always choose the wrong decisions. Interpretation of a dream about buying new black shoes for single women: For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that she is buying new black shoes It means happiness because someone wants to marry her and she is characterized by a good reputation, good morals, and good treatment. If the shoe is black and needs polishing, this means joy, happiness, halal food, and an abundance of goodness, in addition to the fact that the girl must be in good health and able to act and balance things before judging the situation.

title: Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing facial hair in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream, depending on the condition of the person who sees it. And his circumstances, whether he is single or single, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of the appearance of facial hair in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing facial hair in a dream states that there are some problems In the dreamer's life, it causes him a lot of anxiety and distress in his life. Seeing excess hair spread all over the face in a dream indicates some people who feel jealous and hateful. I see in a dream that I am pulling facial hair, which indicates that the monarch is extravagant and wasteful, wasting his money on worthless things. For her. See also: Interpretation of seeing armpit hair in a dream. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream by Nabulsi? Seeing facial hair in a dream indicates the dreamer’s ability to bear all the difficulties and problems in his life. Seeing facial hair removed in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will gain great respect and status. What Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream for a single woman? Seeing individual facial hair in a dream says that she is going through a difficult period and a bad psychological state. Seeing an unmarried woman with hair appearing on her face in a dream indicates that she is trying to rely on herself to ease the burden on her family. Seeing a single woman with hair on her face Her face can also refer to her life, which is full of secrets that no one knows. Seeing a matchmaker with hair on her face in front of her fiancé in a dream shows his interest in their future life and his efforts to make it better. Seeing individual facial hair may indicate that he will get married soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing leg hair in a dream. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman with hair on her face in a dream indicates that she is going through a difficult period with her husband, with many disagreements that may end in divorce. Seeing a married woman with facial hair in a dream indicates that she is a good woman with good morals and reputation. Goodness among people. Seeing a married woman with facial hair in a dream may indicate her husband’s intense love for her and his dedication to a better life for her and their children. See also: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs. What is the interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman with facial hair in a dream says He is going through a difficult period full of problems and crises. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with thick hair on her face that she is trying to remove indicates alleviating her anxiety and eliminating anxiety. Seeing a pregnant woman with a lot of facial hair in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman removing her facial hair in a dream indicates that The period before the elections will be easy, without fatigue or pain. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself combing your hair in a dream. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream.

title: Turnip in a dream |  Interpretation of seeing turnips in the dream of a married, pregnant, or single woman

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, through this article we seek to give a detailed and comprehensive interpretation of turnips in a dream according to what Sheikh Al-Nabulsi wrote, as well as according to the modern psychological approach. Of course, the interpretation of turnips in a man’s dream. I wish everyone a good and useful continuation of this topic. Turnips in a dream | Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi: Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi says in his famous book (Animal Smell in Interpreting a Dream) that the turnip in the interpretation appears to be faded or withered. Seeing a turnip in one dream, and it is praiseworthy in the interpretation for an unmarried woman to see in her dream as if she is eating a boiled turnip or “salghama”, It is also praiseworthy if an unmarried woman sees that she is buying it, because it often indicates good profit. Or benefit, as is the case with other vegetables. The “suljama” or turnip drink deserves high praise if an unmarried woman sees that she is eating it in the winter, as in a dream it indicates harmony and affection, and it may also herald goodness on the road. Pickled turnip in its interpretation deserves praise Unless its color changes to yellow, because pickles or “tarshi” generally indicate money that is saved or money that is spent for good. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is preparing pickled turnips, then she sees that she is cutting it or eating it as an appetizer, If God wills and with His help, you will accept the matter that is good. Blessing is like travel, work, and perhaps marriage. Interpretation of turnips in a married woman’s dream: All vegetables in the interpretation are good. As for roots, such as carrots, turnips, radishes, and potatoes, it is a dream of a married woman, her livelihood, money, or her child if the woman is pregnant, and turnips appear as money if they are boiled, pickled, or salted. Cutting turnips in a married woman’s dream may indicate that you are spending on it for benefit or good. Any food in a married woman’s dream shows nutrition and the best foods in the interpretation, cooked and boiled, are signs of a halal diet and net gains. Turnips soaked in vinegar indicate blessings in the home and may also indicate the sufficiency of food. Interpretation of turnips in a pregnant woman’s dream Referring to many interpretations, whether they rely on the psychological analysis of the symbol or the semantic analysis of the word, and even the Arabic approach to expressing visions, the turnip brings many Positive meanings: It is in a pregnant woman’s dream. A dream for a woman generally indicates intimacy, harmony and compatibility in all matters. Interpretation of turnips in a man’s dream: Turnips in a man’s dream show strength and self-confidence, and sometimes turnips symbolize luck in the field of money and work. Eating fresh turnips in a dream may indicate A man to rush into making decisions without thinking about emergency situations, while in a man's dream, it is commendable to eat cooked and boiled turnips as well as pickled. Planting turnips in a man's dream indicates the achievement of goals and the fulfillment of desires. It is also praiseworthy for a person to see in his dreams as if he is gathering turnips or harvesting them from the field or the

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a veterinarian in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a veterinarian in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person in a dream talking to a veterinarian in a dream, and this indicates his need to correct his mistakes and problems. Along with seeing a person going to the veterinarian, this dream suggests helping the poor and needy and striving for good deeds. As the scholar Ibn Sirin says Sirin, going to the veterinarian is an indicator of getting rid of diseases and problems that the fortuneteller faces. Interpretation of seeing a veterinarian in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is going to the veterinarian with her cat, which she loves very much, this indicates her recovery from the disease. If she sees An unmarried girl in her dream that she is sick, and her fiancé takes her to the veterinarian, this indicates that mistakes have occurred in the girl’s life. If an unmarried girl sees the veterinarian while treating animals, this indicates the date of her imminent marriage to someone she does not love and does not know. Also, To dream of an unmarried girl being treated by an unknown doctor means that she will enter a new job and do well in it. Interpretation of seeing a veterinarian in a dream for a married womanAlso, if a married woman sees that she is going to the veterinarian to treat her small dog, this indicates the end of her problems Throughout her life. Likewise, animals in a married woman’s dream also indicate kindness and longing, like her husband and love of curiosity among people and relatives. Also, seeing a married woman hitting a veterinarian indicates conflicts, tendencies, and ongoing quarrels in her life. Seeing a veterinarian in a dream for a married woman denotes For her appreciation and receiving many rewards for her work. Interpretation of seeing a veterinarian in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is going to the veterinarian, this means that her birth will be easy and that her birth will be very fond of animals. Also, seeing a veterinarian in a dream A pregnant woman indicates a large and plentiful diet and good money that her husband will receive soon. Also, seeing a veterinarian in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a healthy, healthy child, free of all diseases, God willing, and it will never harm him. Interpretation of seeing a veterinarian in a dream for a manIf a man sees His dream that he is going to the veterinarian, this indicates the collapse of problems and disagreements between him and his wife, and God knows best. Likewise, if a person dreams of hitting the doctor in a dream, this indicates his disobedience to God Almighty and his practice of disobedience and immorality. Also, seeing the veterinarian and she was a woman indicates that he married her to his wife. The first also shows that she is a disabled girl. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about cars from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Have you ever dreamed that you were driving a car, buying or selling a car? Did you know that seeing cars in a dream has many meanings and connotations, including positive and negative, and based on the desire of our followers, we will mention today the interpretation of a dream about cars for both unmarried, married and pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin and a number of interpreters. What is the interpretation of a dream about cars? Seeing cars in a dream is an indication of The dreamer loves to travel and move from one place to another to discover new things, so his life is not very stable, but if the dreamer is planning to travel soon then the dream reflects his life as it is very mobile and not fixed in one place. A dream about cars in a dream is an indication that the dreamer He will be exposed to many trials from life and must face them correctly. As for whoever dreams of buying a car, the type of car reflects his status among people. He will lose his current job and become unemployed for a long period and thus be exposed to the accumulation of debts. Interpretation scholars have confirmed that a clean and beautiful car in a dream expresses The dreamer's intention, in addition to that his heart is completely free of hatred or dislike towards anyone, in addition to that he is completely satisfied with his life. Hatred of others. Interpretation of a dream about cars by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing cars in a dream symbolizes the facilitation of all the dreamer’s affairs and that he will be able to achieve all his goals and will have a lot in the future.. The dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin claims that driving a high-end car is a sign of the dreamer’s illness and status. High, and may gain a leadership position among the people. Beauty and high personality in the case of driving an iron car. The dream means that the dreamer is brave and able to face the crises of his life. Interpretation of a dream about cars for single women. The car in a single woman’s dream indicates that the dreamer will enter into many life battles through which he will gain experiences, and driving a car in a state of balance for one is a sign However, the dreamer can control his emotions and reactions. Seeing a car in one dream is evidence that the dreamer is taking advantage of all means and methods that help him achieve his goals, and a Virgo girl driving a car is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a leading and important position. Small cars in a single person’s dream mean that she will gradually achieve her dreams. Riding a luxury car for Israa Al-Fardi indicates that she will marry a rich man who will help her achieve all her dreams, except that he deserves the responsibilities assigned to him. Driving a car in a person’s dream while feeling comfortable is a sign that the dreamer He will gain the security and confidence that he lacks in his life. Interpretation of a dream about car racing for singles: If a single woman sees car racing in her dream, this means that she has a lot of strength and confirmation that she will get a lot of good things to move her life forward. Therefore, it is one of the positive, distinctive and very optimistic visions. Many jurists have also confirmed that a girl who sees a car race in her dream interprets this vision as meaning that she has some obstacles in her life and a confirmation that she will be successful.

title: A detailed interpretation of the letter R in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing a head in a dream about Nablus. A head in a dream is a symbol of the dreamer’s size and value among those around him, or it is an indication of the size of his capital and wealth. A large head in a dream represents pride and honor, and the opposite of seeing a small head. Whoever sees himself carrying two or more heads means victory over enemies. , wealth in a dream for the poor, marriage in one’s dream, and good offspring, which is praiseworthy in all respects. Cutting your head in a dream is evidence of living in injustice and humiliation for a long time, or it may indicate acknowledging a mistake and repenting from it. Cutting off your head in a dream means Money, a wound or wound in the head means illness, and turning the dreamer’s head into the head of an animal means fatigue, toil and humiliation, and turning him into the head of a lion. Or the elephant is his victory and a position of prestige, and eating the head is corruption and gossip, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marble for Nabulsi Marble in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate pride and pride in the affairs of the fortuneteller, and it symbolizes money and wealth after extreme poverty, pride, and advancement in positions. In summary, marble or alabaster in a dream is a symbol of a woman who has a great share of beauty, and God knows best. Seeing nosebleeds in a dream from Nablus. Nosebleeds are among the unwanted symbols that portend in a pregnant woman’s dream the loss of her fetus, God forbid. Light, wet nosebleeds symbolize illicit money. Whoever feels in a dream that he benefits from a nosebleed shows goodness, and vice versa, if he feels weak, then it means poverty, weakness, and humiliation. In general, a nosebleed in a dream portends many problems, worries, distress, and troubles. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a loaf of Nabulsi: The loaf in a dream is one of the good symbols that heralds the abundance of food and money, and eating a loaf in a dream indicates abundant living and livelihood. The live loaf is a symbol of profit and small profits, and God knows best. Sand in a dream for Nabulsi. Sand and sand are signs that indicate that the dreamer is being deceived. Or theft, or it may indicate large sums of money and a large profit from travel, or the dreamer’s preoccupation with his religious and worldly circumstances. Raising sand in a dream portends torment, and sand in the hand is a sign of something that is disturbing the dreamer in his world, and collecting sand brings a lot of money and goodness. Walking on sand portends many problems and worries, and God knows best. Conjunctivitis in a dream in Nablus, an ophthalmology disease that affects the eye, and in the dream it represents poverty, distress, and great misguidance, or a deficiency in the dreamer’s religion, and it portends sadness and anxiety that will afflict the dreamer in his children and in general. It is one of the undesirable symbols, and God knows best. Basil in a dream about Nablus. Basil in a dream denotes good deeds and the likeness of comfort, the removal of worries, problems, and distress, and the fulfillment of promises. Basil in one’s dream symbolizes a close marriage, and in a married person’s dream it is a sign for a male, and basil in a sick person’s dream portends the approaching of his guardianship and blessings. Basil is a disease that affects the dreamer, and God knows best. Meanings of the letter Ra for Nablus Thunder is one of the symbols that conveys a message to the dreamer to review all his actions, affairs, and relationships with others and direct him to repair his relationship with others.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about paper money by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about money and paper: The dreamer seeing paper money in a dream leads to his constant thinking about the future, either for fear of not getting something, or suffering from many major financial crises, and the dreamer may have many dreams that he wishes to achieve, and in this we will explain all Meanings and clues to reassure the dreamer’s heart. Interpretation of a dream about paper money. Many interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing banknotes in a dream indicates radical changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life for the better, which heralds that God will open wide doors of livelihood for him that will improve his family’s circumstances in a few days. Next.Seeing finding paper money in a dream means that the dreamer has a strong and responsible personality and takes the issues of his life seriously and calmly in order to overcome all the difficult stages and not affect him in the future. Interpretation paper of the dream of money by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin confirmed and said that seeing paper money in a dream indicates To the end of the difficult crises and problems that the dreamer faced in previous periods and his acceptance of a period of his life filled with many positive changes that will completely change his life. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing paper money in a man’s dream indicates that God has great mercy on him with the blessings and goodness that flood his life and make his heart happy. Ibn Sirin also pointed out that seeing paper money in the dreamer’s dream indicates the end of financial crises and the constant feeling of distress and that he will live his life in the coming period with a lot of goodness and food, God willing. As for seeing a lot of banknotes during the dreamer’s sleep, this is an indication that he is living. His life is in a state of calm and psychological stability, and he is a person who is very reconciled with himself in reality. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. The interpretation of a dream about paper money for Nabulsi has been agreed upon. Al-Nabulsi scholar with the scholar Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of seeing paper money in a dream, and he also said: It indicates goodness and abundance that will fill the dreamer’s life in the coming periods. Al-Nabulsi scholar also said that seeing banknotes in a man’s dream means that he will give birth to a good child who will be fair to him and a cause. To change his life and his family for the better. The researcher Al-Nabulsi also mentioned that seeing the dreamer while he is sleeping means that he will receive a lot of money and very large amounts in the coming days. While if the dreamer sees himself throwing a lot of banknotes out of the window in his dream, this indicates the end of the worries and problems that It dominated his life to a large extent in previous periods. Individual dream interpretation of money and paper. A single woman dreams of paper money, this is a sign that she will receive an inheritance that will change the course of her life for the better. But if a girl dreams that someone is giving her banknotes, this is a sign that she will enter In a love story with a reliable young man who takes good care of her and takes care of her

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: To see or hear Surat Al-Kalam in a dream, means knowledge, wisdom, and abundance of knowledge for the dreamer, as God gives him eloquence in speech. A sign of logic and wisdom. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surah Al-Qalam in a dream by Ibn Sirin. When the dreamer sees that he is reciting “Surat Al-Kalam” or that he is reciting “Surat Al-Kalam” in his dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will see the miracles of God Almighty. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself reciting “Surat Al-Kalam” Or dreaming, this may indicate that the dreamer will receive a message from God. When the dreamer sees himself reciting “Surat Al-Kalam” or reciting it in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will come to God with wisdom and wisdom. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself reciting “Surat Al-Kalam” “Al-Kalam” or dreaming, this may indicate that the dreamer will come to God with knowledge. When the dreamer recites “Surat Al-Kalam” in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be supported by God Almighty and support him against his enemies. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surah Al-Kalam, this may indicate Until the dreamer will become a noble person. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing or hearing Surat An-Nisa in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream for a single girlThe pen in a dream shows the girl shells, and the girl sees the dream, or it shows the nobility and integrity of everything she does in life. It is said That a single girl dreamed or saw a pen shows the skills a girl uses to succeed at work. Some people say that a single woman’s dream of a pen indicates that she has met an important person in life or that she will meet a tolerant and educated person. She wants to see her for a while. But the pen represents knowledge, learning and culture. Whoever sees him writing with a pen indicates that he will gain more knowledge and receive more education. If a girl knows that she knows a group of people, it means that she is proud and honored by that. Because he knows people, and whoever knows someone will receive rich rewards. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream for a married woman. A married woman, if she sees her husband or child, gives her a pen to show her vision of humanity with good news. Or she will win great merit and status. If she sees that she is writing with a pen, her opinion indicates that she will sign documents in her life. Which helps a lot and gets a lot of money. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream about a pregnant womanIt can be explained that if a woman sees a dream in her dream, she sees a tall old man reciting the Qur’an. It indicates that there will be many benefits soon. He also explained that if a woman sees a dream in her sleep, it means that she gave birth and read Surat Al-Kalam in her dream. This indicates God’s desire to give her a comfortable time so that the delivery will be easy, God willing. He also explained that If a woman sees a dream in a dream, then she has given birth to a child and her child is next to her, and from this happiness she stands and reads everything. This indicates that the beauty that he enjoys and his provision has a high status in his life, and God Almighty knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing
